obfuscation: Do n't be alarmed -- it 's not serious .
original: Don't be alarmed--it's not serious.

obfuscation: It is arranged that , until it is decided which of us two is the actual King , we are to act as one person .
original:
It is arranged
  that, until it is decided which of us two is the actual King, we
  are to act as one person.

obfuscation: Exactly .
original: Exactly.

obfuscation: Now , although we act as one person , we are , in point of fact , two persons .
original: Now, although we act as one person, we are, in point of fact, two persons.

obfuscation: Ah , I do n't think we can go into that .
original: Ah, I don't think we can go into that.

obfuscation: It is a legal fiction , and legal fictions are solemn things .
original:
It is a
  legal fiction, and legal fictions are solemn things.

obfuscation: Situated as we are , we ca n't recognize two independent responsibilities .
original:
Situated as
  we are, we can't recognize two independent responsibilities.

obfuscation: No ; but you can recognize two independent appetites .
original: No; but you can recognize two independent appetites.

obfuscation: It 's all very well to say we act as one person , but when you supply us with entirely one ration between us , I should describe it as a legal fiction carried a little too far .
original:
It's all very well to say we act as one person, but when you
  supply us with only one ration between us, I should describe it
  as a legal fiction carried a little too far.

obfuscation: It 's rather a nice point .
original: It's rather a nice point.

obfuscation: I do n't like to express an opinion off-hand .
original:
I don't like to express an
  opinion off-hand.

obfuscation: Suppose we reserve it for argument before the full Court ?
original:
Suppose we reserve it for argument before the
  full Court?

obfuscation: Yes , but what are we to do in the meantime ?
original: Yes, but what are we to do in the meantime?

obfuscation: We want our tea .
original: We want our tea.

obfuscation: I think we may make an interim order for double rations on their Majesties entering into the usual undertaking to indemnify in the event of an adverse decision ?
original:
I think we may make an interim order for double
  rations on their Majesties entering into the usual undertaking to
  indemnify in the event of an adverse decision?

obfuscation: That , I think , will meet the case .
original: That, I think, will meet the case.

obfuscation: But you must work hard -- stick to it -- nothing like work .
original:
But you must work
  hard--stick to it--nothing like work.

obfuscation: Oh , certainly .
original: Oh, certainly.

obfuscation: We quite understand that a man who holds the magnificent position of King should do something to justify it .
original:
We quite understand that a man who
  holds the magnificent position of King should do something to
  justify it.

obfuscation: We are called `` Your Majesty '' ; we are allowed to buy ourselves magnificent clothes ; our subjects frequently nod to us in the streets ; the sentries always return our salutes ; and we enjoy the inestimable privilege of heading the subscription lists to all the principal charities .
original:
We are called "Your Majesty"; we are allowed to buy
  ourselves magnificent clothes; our subjects frequently nod to us
  in the streets; the sentries always return our salutes; and we
  enjoy the inestimable privilege of heading the subscription lists
  to all the principal charities.

obfuscation: In return for these advantages the least we can do is to make ourselves useful about the Palace .
original:
In return for these advantages
  the least we can do is to make ourselves useful about the Palace.

obfuscation: Rising early in the morning , We proceed to light the fire , Then our Majesty adorning In its workaday attire , We embark without delay On the duties of the day .
original:
Rising early in the morning,
 We proceed to light the fire,
  Then our Majesty adorning
       In its workaday attire,
            We embark without delay
            On the duties of the day.

obfuscation: First , we polish off some batches Of political despatches , And foreign politicians circumvent ; Then , if business is n't heavy , We may have a Royal levee , Or ratify some Acts of Parliament .
original:
First, we polish off some batches
  Of political despatches,
       And foreign politicians circumvent;
  Then, if business isn't heavy,
  We may hold a Royal levee,
       Or ratify some Acts of Parliament.

obfuscation: Then we probably review the household troops -- With the usual `` Shalloo humps ! ''
original:
Then we probably review the household troops--
       With the usual "Shalloo humps!"

obfuscation: and `` Shalloo hoops ! ''
original: and "Shalloo hoops!"

obfuscation: Or receive with ceremonial and state An interesting Eastern potentate .
original:
Or receive with ceremonial and state
  An interesting Eastern potentate.
